name: AWS ELB
semantic_context: Sends data to AWS ELB API
natural_language_description: 这是 AWS ELB 节点。主要用于: Sends data to AWS ELB API

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authentication | 默认值: iam

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: loadBalancer

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: add
available_options: Add (值: add) - Add the specified SSL server certificate to the certificate list for the specified HTTPS or TLS listener
Get Many (值: getMany) - Get many listener certificates
Remove (值: remove) - Remove the specified certificate from the certificate list for the specified HTTPS or TLS listener

ipAddressType.name: ipAddressType
ipAddressType.description: The type of IP addresses used by the subnets for your load balancer
ipAddressType.natural_language_description: 参数名: IP Address Type | 作用: The type of IP addresses used by the subnets for your load balancer | 默认值: ipv4 | (必填项)

name.name: name
name.description: This name must be unique per region per account, can have a maximum of 32 characters
name.natural_language_description: 参数名: Name | 作用: This name must be unique per region per account, can have a maximum of 32 characters | (必填项)

schema.name: schema
schema.natural_language_description: 参数名: Schema | 默认值: internet-facing | (必填项)

type.name: type
type.natural_language_description: 参数名: Type | 默认值: application | (必填项)

subnets.name: subnets
subnets.description: Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression
subnets.natural_language_description: 参数名: Subnet ID Names or IDs | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression | 默认值: [] | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: securityGroups (值: None) - Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression

loadBalancerId.displayName: Load Balancer ARN Name or ID
loadBalancerId.name: loadBalancerId
loadBalancerId.description: Unique identifier for a particular loadBalancer. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
loadBalancerId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Load Balancer ARN Name or ID | 作用: Unique identifier for a particular loadBalancer. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 100

filters.name: filters
filters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 默认值: {}
available_options: names (值: None) - The names of the load balancers. Multiples can be defined separated by comma.

listenerId.name: listenerId
listenerId.description: Unique identifier for a particular loadBalancer. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
listenerId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Listener ARN Name or ID | 作用: Unique identifier for a particular loadBalancer. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

certificateId.name: certificateId
certificateId.description: Unique identifier for a particular loadBalancer
certificateId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Certificate ARN | 作用: Unique identifier for a particular loadBalancer | (必填项)
